moves.name: Close the gap
moves.note: to T-position, kick leg and pummel to clinch

moves.name: Sucker Punch Defense
moves.note: Roundhouse punch close and lunging punch and straight punch

moves.name: Front Kick Defense (to mid-section)
moves.note: Absorb, step back, catch, cup heel and lift

moves.name: Low Kick Defense
moves.note: Shield and clinch

moves.name: Roundhouse (High) Kick Defense
moves.note: Block with hand on hip and cover head, go to foot lock

moves.name: T-Position Leg Throw
moves.note: pull ankle with foot in circular motion, put your foot back on the floor

moves.name: T-Position Throw From Behind
moves.note: sit, block far foot, and extend arm to help you climb on top

moves.name: Guillotine Choke
moves.note: standing

moves.name: Bajana
moves.note: double leg takedown - knee over toe and drive with head

moves.name: Wrist Grab Escape (same side)
moves.note: pull between thumb and fingers

moves.name: Wrist Grab Escape (two handed)
moves.note: grab own wrist and pull back

moves.name: Single-Hand Lapel Grab Defense
moves.note: with thumb facing down (straight arm) waki gatame

moves.name: Single-Hand Lapel Grab Defense (bent arm)
moves.note: low grab, step under to chicken wing

moves.name: Single-Hand Lapel Grab Defense (palm turned up)
moves.note: high lapel grab, wrist lock with leg trip

moves.name: Two-Handed Lapel Grab Defense (with hip throw)
moves.note: high grab to head and arm hip throw

moves.name: Two-Handed Front Choke Defense
moves.note: support elbows, duck under and step back

moves.name: Guillotine Defense (sitting back)
moves.note: both hands on one knee and sit and bridge

moves.name: Guillotine Defense (with trip takedown)
moves.note: arm over shoulder, weight down and buckle the knee

moves.name: Rear Choke Defense (throw)
moves.note: walk backwards and throw over shoulder

moves.name: Rear Choke Defense Pulled Back (with side throw)
moves.note: elbow tight to chest, reap leg and bow

moves.name: Club Defense (overhead close range)
moves.note: catch wrist with hand and grab under arm

moves.name: Standing Hair/Ear Grab Defense
moves.note: both hands grab wrist, pull and turn

moves.name: Rear Bear Hug Defense (over the arms)
moves.note: be sure to have hips engaged

moves.name: Rear Bear Hug Defense (under the arms with lift)
moves.note: hook outside leg with foot

moves.name: Front Bear Hug Defense (over the arms)
moves.note: hands on hips, knees to T-position, hip throw

moves.name: Front Bear Hug Defense (under the arms with frame)
moves.note: frame face drop back

moves.name: Single Hand Front Choke Defense (against wall)
moves.note: strike wrist, turn, elbow to head

moves.name: Headlock Defense (attacker upright)
moves.note: cup chin, look up, squat and lift leg

moves.name: Headlock Defense (with punch)
moves.note: grab wrist and elbow, hips in, go under arm to bent arm lock

moves.name: Regain Guard From Cross Body (both arms across)
moves.note: insert knee, pinch legs, and recover guard

moves.name: Cross Body Defense (turn to knees)
moves.note: thread the needle

moves.name: 1 Side Headlock Defense
moves.note: make a frame - leg over head, triangle legs or go to knees

moves.name: 2 Side Headlock Defense
moves.note: opponent's head low - bridge and roll in one movement

moves.name: 3 Side Headlock Defense
moves.note: hips under - bridge to get their hips up, pull them over your hips

moves.name: 4 Side Headlock Defense
moves.note: go to back-make them drive and lift knee, hook leg, and go to back

moves.name: 5 Side Headlock Defense
moves.note: go to knees - feet are close, grab shoulder over head and pull back

moves.name: American Arm Lock
moves.note: (americana) paintbrush, key lock

moves.name: Cross Body Kimura
moves.note: figure four grip, step over head with leg, and arm bent 90 degrees

moves.name: Cross Body Neck Crank
moves.note: step over with leg and drive hips

moves.name: Straight Armlock From Cross Body
moves.note: Attack kimura, when they straighten their arm, switch to straight arm lock (arm just below elbow)

label: Mount-Getting to Mount from Cross Body

moves.name: Basic Mount From Cross Body (arm out)
moves.note: knee across, drive femur with knee

moves.name: Basic Mount From Cross Body (arm in)
moves.note: pull elbow up, heel on knee, hip in, head to floor

moves.name: Mount Prevention From Cross Body
moves.note: move away, opposite foot on knee

moves.name: Mounted Punch Attack Defense
moves.note: upa and wrap arm to bridge

moves.name: Upa with Choke Defense
moves.note: pull lapel down and keep turned

moves.name: Elbow Escape
moves.note: recover guard

moves.name: Maintain the Mount
moves.note: swimming through arms

moves.name: Maintain the Mount
moves.note: pulling hands off knees

moves.name: Maintain the Mount
moves.note: pushing head

moves.name: Basic Cross Choke
moves.note: palms up, keep head off center

moves.name: Bent Arm Lock
moves.note: (americana) paint brush

moves.name: Straight Arm Lock
moves.note: push off center of chest with both hands, spin and go to arm lock

moves.name: Back Mount Escape
moves.note: back to floor, elbow to floor, grab knee and drive

moves.name: Rear Choke Escape
moves.note: finger point, back on floor, grab knee and drive

moves.name: Maintain Back Mount
moves.note: lapel grip under arms and seatbelt

moves.name: Collar Choke
moves.note: sliding lapel choke, pull one lapel to hip and one across neck

moves.name: Mata Leao (rear naked choke)
moves.note: wrist to shoulder and bring elbows toward each other

moves.name: Posture
moves.note: driving hips to ground, one arm posting and one on hips

moves.name: Choke Protection From Guard
moves.note: grab over arms, fist in armpit

moves.name: Choke Defense
moves.note: comb the hair and duck under

moves.name: Choke Defense
moves.note: squeeze the bread with and without lapel

moves.name: Guillotine Choke Defense
moves.note: arm over shoulder and fall to side

moves.name: Arm Bar Protection
moves.note: connect elbow to knees and catch back of leg

moves.name: Cross Choke
moves.note: raise hips off floor

moves.name: Straight Arm Lock
moves.note: raise hips and calf on back of neck, keep toes pointed up

moves.name: Triangle Choke
moves.note: jump rope arm, triangle, toes up and pull head

moves.name: Kimura
moves.note: elbow to armpit, scoot away to isolate arms, cross feet over back

moves.name: Guillotine Choke
moves.note: wrist to shoulder, knee to mid-section to maintain distance, then pull into guard

moves.name: Pass The Guard (kneeling)
moves.note: stacking shoulder pass, keep elbows inside

moves.name: Pass The Guard (standing)
moves.note: double lapel grab, drag under, pinch legs and pass

moves.name: Scissor Sweep To Mount
moves.note: pistol grip sleeve, pull them to you to stretch them out

moves.name: Hook Sweep
moves.note: from kneeling, pinch/bite support leg, keep knee on belly to prevent

moves.name: Sit Up Sweep
moves.note: knee to ground, pinch with foot, toes pointed, sweep as they sit back
